title: The Frozen Road
description: From filmmaker Ben Page, The Frozen Road chronicles the Canadian Arctic segment of his bike ride around the world. The film captures Page as he encounters frigid temperatures, a hungry pack of wolves, and the anxiety of traveling alone. The video has taken home awards from the Banff Mountain Film Festival and 5Point Film Festival for its stark portrayal of Page’s experience.
